ing: 1 (32 ounce) package frozen potatoes au gratin
2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of chicken soup
des: "These killer potatoes are great with meatloaf or as an accompaniment with anything! They are killer because of their delicious combination of potatoes, soup, sour cream and cheese."
ins:
Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C).
In a large bowl combine the potatoes, sour cream, cheese and soup and mix well. Spread mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish and top with crushed corn flakes.
Bake for 75 minutes, or until cooked through and golden .
